attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people wish to see this Parliament dissolved, due to the abuses caused by its members, thus rendering the institution unfit for government.

New elections should then be held, thereby allowing the public to select representatives who will promise to create a more accountable form of government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
